DOC.brief_summary: This study is to investigate the safety and tolerability of high doses of inhaled mannitol in subjects with bronchiectasis to further direct development of an improved drug delivery system.
DOC.criteria: adult subjects with nonCF bronchiectasis FEV1 > 50 % predicted and > 1.0L bronchiectasis due to CF or endobronchial lesion respiratory infection requiring IV antibiotics in last 4 weeks pregnancy significant haemoptysis in last 6 months active TB end stage ILD contraindications as determined by investigator
